Scene:
Chozaemon's Suicide
(Chōzaemon seppuku / 長左衛門切腹)

Play: The Tycoon's Exploit (絵本太功記 絵本太功記)

Production: April 1974 Asahiza

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Oritayū V (see also Takemoto Tsunatayū IX) (竹本織大夫 (五))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Katsutarō II (野澤勝太郎 (二))
